question: ICC World Test Championship: Australia vs. South Africa
description:
This market will resolve to whichever national team wins the 2025 ICC World Test Championship final between Australia and South Africa, scheduled to begin June 11, 2025, at 5:30 AM ET.

If Australia wins the match, this market will resolve to "Australia".

If South Africa wins the match, this market will resolve to "South Africa".

If the match is affected by weather or other interruptions, and a winner is determined using the DuckworthLewisStern (DLS) method, the market will resolve in favor of the team officially declared the winner by the ICC.

If the match is declared a draw, tied, abandoned, has no result, or does not finish before July 1, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 5050.

question: Will The New York Times update its privacy policy before July?
description:

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be less than $104K on June 8 at 5 PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 8 June '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 8 June '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will Trump attend UFC 316 tonight?
description:
The UFC 316: Dvalishvili vs. O'Malley 2 event is scheduled for June 7, 2025. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump attends UFC 316. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

If the event is canceled or postponed beyond June 12, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

Attending the event is defined as being in physical attendance during any part of the event.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.
